named-query.name: countPolicies
named-query.query: SELECT count(pol) FROM Policy pol WHERE (UPPER(pol.title) LIKE :title OR :title IS NULL) AND (UPPER(pol.description) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL) AND (pol.policyTypeId = :policyTypeId OR :policyTypeId IS NULL) AND (pol.activationDateExpression LIKE :activationDateExpression OR :activationDateExpression IS NULL) AND (pol.activationCondition LIKE :activationCondition OR :activationCondition IS NULL) AND (UPPER(pol.mandate) LIKE :mandate OR :mandate IS NULL) AND (pol.evaluationCode = :evaluationCode OR :evaluationCode IS NULL)

named-query.name: findPolicies
named-query.query: SELECT pol FROM Policy pol WHERE (UPPER(pol.title) LIKE :title OR :title IS NULL) AND (UPPER(pol.description) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL) AND (pol.policyTypeId = :policyTypeId OR :policyTypeId IS NULL) AND (pol.activationDateExpression LIKE :activationDateExpression OR :activationDateExpression IS NULL) AND (pol.activationCondition LIKE :activationCondition OR :activationCondition IS NULL) AND (UPPER(pol.mandate) LIKE :mandate OR :mandate IS NULL) AND (pol.evaluationCode = :evaluationCode OR :evaluationCode IS NULL) ORDER BY pol.policyId

named-query.name: countDisposalHolds
named-query.query: SELECT count(h) FROM DisposalHold h WHERE (UPPER(h.title) LIKE :title OR :title IS NULL) AND (UPPER(h.reason) LIKE :reason OR :reason IS NULL) AND (h.startDate <= :endDate OR :endDate IS NULL) AND (h.endDate IS NULL OR h.endDate >= :startDate OR :startDate IS NULL)

named-query.name: findDisposalHolds
named-query.query: SELECT h FROM DisposalHold h WHERE (UPPER(h.title) LIKE :title OR :title IS NULL) AND (UPPER(h.reason) LIKE :reason OR :reason IS NULL) AND (h.startDate <= :endDate OR :endDate IS NULL) AND (h.endDate IS NULL OR h.endDate >= :startDate OR :startDate IS NULL) ORDER BY h.dispHoldId, h.startDate

named-query.name: countClassPolicies
named-query.query: SELECT count(cp) FROM ClassPolicy cp WHERE (cp.classId = :classId OR :classId IS NULL) AND (cp.policyId = :policyId OR :policyId IS NULL)

named-query.name: findClassPolicyViews
named-query.query: SELECT cp, pol FROM ClassPolicy cp, Policy pol WHERE cp.policyId = pol.policyId AND (cp.classId = :classId OR :classId IS NULL) AND (cp.policyId = :policyId OR :policyId IS NULL) ORDER BY cp.classId, pol.policyId

named-query.name: countCasePolicies
named-query.query:
SELECT count(cp) FROM CasePolicy cp WHERE (cp.caseId = :caseId OR :caseId IS NULL) AND (cp.policyId = :policyId OR :policyId IS NULL) AND (cp.activationDate <= :activationDate OR :activationDate IS NULL) AND
(cp.creationDateTime >= :startCreationDateTime OR :startCreationDateTime IS NULL) AND (cp.creationDateTime <= :endCreationDateTime OR :endCreationDateTime IS NULL) AND
(cp.approvalDateTime >= :startApprovalDateTime OR :startApprovalDateTime IS NULL) AND (cp.approvalDateTime <= :endApprovalDateTime OR :endApprovalDateTime IS NULL) AND
(cp.activationDate >= :startActivationDate OR :startActivationDate IS NULL) AND (cp.activationDate <= :endActivationDate OR :endActivationDate IS NULL) AND
(cp.executionDateTime >= :startExecutionDateTime OR :startExecutionDateTime IS NULL) AND (cp.executionDateTime <= :endExecutionDateTime OR :endExecutionDateTime IS NULL) AND
(cp.dispHoldId = :dispHoldId OR :dispHoldId IS NULL) AND (cp.stateValue = :stateValue OR :stateValue IS NULL)

named-query.name: findCasePolicyViews
named-query.query:
SELECT cp, pol FROM CasePolicy cp, Policy pol WHERE cp.policyId = pol.policyId AND (cp.caseId = :caseId OR :caseId IS NULL) AND (cp.policyId = :policyId OR :policyId IS NULL) AND (cp.activationDate <= :activationDate OR :activationDate IS NULL) AND
(cp.creationDateTime >= :startCreationDateTime OR :startCreationDateTime IS NULL) AND (cp.creationDateTime <= :endCreationDateTime OR :endCreationDateTime IS NULL) AND
(cp.approvalDateTime >= :startApprovalDateTime OR :startApprovalDateTime IS NULL) AND (cp.approvalDateTime <= :endApprovalDateTime OR :endApprovalDateTime IS NULL) AND
(cp.activationDate >= :startActivationDate OR :startActivationDate IS NULL) AND (cp.activationDate <= :endActivationDate OR :endActivationDate IS NULL) AND
(cp.executionDateTime >= :startExecutionDateTime OR :startExecutionDateTime IS NULL) AND (cp.executionDateTime <= :endExecutionDateTime OR :endExecutionDateTime IS NULL) AND
(cp.dispHoldId = :dispHoldId OR :dispHoldId IS NULL) AND (cp.stateValue = :stateValue OR :stateValue IS NULL) ORDER BY cp.caseId, cp.activationDate
